<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shoki's Argument](/Feats.aspx?ID=2359) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 30 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You feel a connection to [shoksi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2421), the rambling collectors of wayward souls, and might have found old texts written by one. You are trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6). If you were already trained in Diplomacy (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can also cast [_disrupt undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=79) as a divine innate cantrip at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Shoki's Argument
